ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to create a Pie Chart. This is a circular chart type consisting of sectors which are proportional to the quantity it represents.
[i][b]Tips![/i][/b] [i]You can change the fill color of every segment and style of its label.[/i]
[i]The labels can be placed outside or inside a segment.[/i]
[i]Every segment can be highlighted by clicking on it or when selected in the Legend.[/i]
[i]Hover a segment with the cursor to see a tooltip with additional info about it![/i]
